To the Editor

The recent adverse publicity surrounding the extracurricular activities of

a few UT football players is disturbing PERIOD I would like to couch my comments

in the form of a joke which has been around UT long before any of the

present team members came into this world PERIOD

Two male college students were in the mens room standing side by side at

urinals PERIOD As they stepped away one turned toward the sinks PERIOD He said  The other

replied 

Its time to get back to basics PERIOD
